messages.message: Hi All, we are planning to remove the ocr-ari11-tservice from our codebase.  Only SC has this deployed in their current env and they are planning to remove it as well.  We don’t support this service anymore.  Please let me know if you have any questions.  cc @Hari
@Varun Jain @Shubhu FYI - When is SC removing this from their deployment?
let me ask an extremely basic question actually: How can we answer "who uses x" question across our customers deployments?
We have a git repo, that tracks the state of deployments for each customer’s environment: https://github.com/instabase/deployments
How easy is that to get an answer to your question above from that git repo?
That’s what we ship, but I guess the question of whether they are actually using the features is harder to track?
are there logs we can ask to get from customers regularly that can tell us "what they are using"?
Yes, the customers can simply run a command line to tell us whether they run it or not.
oh nice. please feel free to share that command with TAMs if we need to answer the above question then.
yes!  absolutely.  @Ozge for the ari-12, I’m explicitly calling out deleting the deployments as we ship 21.* releases to customers.

@Ozge we are working with SC team to transition their bank statements application from ocr-ari11 service to our updated ocr-service by June end.

@shaunak I’ll confirm with their team today if the migration is on track. We can then remove the support with our June release.
